Name: Ghost
Overview: Ghost is a free and open-source blogging platform written in JavaScript and distributed under the MIT License, designed to simplify the process of online publishing for individual bloggers as well as online publications. This version includes mapping for MariaDB and SMTP. Big credits to Bitnami for the amazing image. Another fine product, brought to you by IBRACORP.

GHOST_HOST.Name: GHOST_HOST
GHOST_HOST.Description: If you want to access your application from a public IP or hostname you need to set this environment variable to your public IP or hostname. E.g. blog.example.com

BLOG_TITLE.Name: BLOG_TITLE
BLOG_TITLE.Description: Ghost blog title. Default: User's Blog

MARIADB_HOST.Name: MARIADB_HOST
MARIADB_HOST.Description: Hostname for MariaDB server. Default: mariadb

MARIADB_PORT_NUMBER.Name: MARIADB_PORT_NUMBER
MARIADB_PORT_NUMBER.Description: Port used by MariaDB server. Default: 3306

GHOST_DATABASE_NAME.Name: GHOST_DATABASE_NAME
GHOST_DATABASE_NAME.Description: Database name that Ghost will use to connect with the database. Default: bitnami_ghost

GHOST_DATABASE_USER.Name: GHOST_DATABASE_USER
GHOST_DATABASE_USER.Description: Database user that Ghost will use to connect with the database. Default: bn_ghost

GHOST_DATABASE_PASSWORD.Name: GHOST_DATABASE_PASSWORD
GHOST_DATABASE_PASSWORD.Description: Database password that Ghost will use to connect with the database. No defaults.

ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD.Name: ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD
ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD.Description: It can be used to allow blank passwords. Default: no

SMTP_SERVICE.Name: SMTP_SERVICE
SMTP_SERVICE.Description: SMTP service to use. E.g. GMail or Mailgun

SMTP_SECURE_CONNECTION.Name: SMTP_SECURE_CONNECTION
SMTP_SECURE_CONNECTION.Description: Use a secure connection for SMTP. true or false

GHOST_PROTOCOL.Name: GHOST_PROTOCOL
GHOST_PROTOCOL.Description: Protocol to use in the application URLs. Valid values are https or https. Default: http

GHOST_PASSWORD.Name: GHOST_PASSWORD
GHOST_PASSWORD.Description: Ghost application password. The minimum length is 10 characters. Default: bitnami123
